children.text: Climatic system
Temperature
Mean temperature
Changes in mean temperature (not further specified)
Changes in the frequency of hot / warm days
Changes in the frequency of cold days
Changes in the temperature during the night
Changes in the temperature during the day
Changes in temperature associated with elevation
Changes in temperature fluctuation
Temperature extremes
Changes in the frequency of days with extreme temperatures
Changes in the frequency of heat waves
Changes in the frequency of cold waves
Changes in the length/duration of heat waves
Changes in the length/duration of cold waves
Changes in the intensity / strength of heat waves

Changes in the frequency of unusual temperatures in a given season

Changes in the frequency of extreme cold seasons

Changes in the frequency of extreme hot seasons
Changes in the intensity / strength of extreme hot seasons
Sunshine

Changes in sunshine intensity

Seasonal precipitation
Changes in the amount of rainfall in a given season

Changes in the sea surface temperature (not further specified)

Changes in the sea level

Changes in the level of tides

Changes in the structure of beach soil

Changes in the abundance or occurrence of marine animal and plant species stated as invasive

Marine spp quality
Changes in the taste of marine animal and plant species

Changes in pasture seed availability

Cultural/Spiritual/ Identity values

Infrastructure
